name: Kular
headline: Replacing 20 Million Salespeople With AI
description:
Hey! We're Kular. We believe human salespeople will be replaced by AI, and we’re working to build that future. 

Our growth rate has rocketed up (reach out for specific numbers). We're now hiring to keep up with demand.

Kular is being built by a team of MIT, IIT, Cambridge and Oxford grads, backed by some of the best investors in the world, including Y-Combinator, Entrepreneur First, Acequia Capital and angel investors behind companies like Ironclad, OpenSea and Stripe.

founders.name: Nelson Jones, Founder
founders.description: Nelson is the cofounder of Kula and an entrepreneur by background, having started a profitable business in his last year of university. Before Kula, he sold software to top lawyers at Luminance, and studied law at Oxford University.

founders.name: Saaras Mehan, Founder
founders.description: Saaras Mehan is the cofounder and CTO of Kular. Saaras leads the technical team and single-handedly built an MVP used by over 100 lawyers. Saaras competed in international chess as a child, before patenting a machine learning algorithm as a teenager, and joining Microsoft Research’s Azure Sphere team as a young adult. He earned a degree in computer science from the University of Cambridge.

Grow your business
## Join 700+ companies

First Gen Law converted a single Kular lead into a $250K deal
Get better results
## Reach and win your perfect clients
![Target Audience](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c913407042c830e62250f/6685c86a37cbe0e5101a3169_Frame%2060.svg)
01
### Define your target audience
Describe who you would like to reach and let Kular do the rest. Our AI will search our extensive database to find your ideal clients.**200+ million contacts available worldwide**
[Find your audience](https://www.kular.ai/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/vO33C21e>)
02
### Enhance reach, protect reputation
Kular will draft messaging which you can edit and approve. Kular’s AI avoids spam filters to maximize deliverability and protect your domain credibility.**2x industry standard for email deliverability**
[Book more meetings](https://www.kular.ai/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/vO33C21e>)
![Statistics](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c913407042c830e62250f/6686a56b9c3c19a2de5d3b45_Frame%2058%20\(1\).svg)
![Kular Cutting Edge AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c913407042c830e62250f/6685c86237cbe0e5101a2ab4_Frame%2059.svg)
03
### Leave the hard work to Kular
Kular’s cutting-edge AI continuously learns from warm email responses, optimizing for the best conversion rates. You need just 1 hour a month to manage Kular.**3x industry standard reply rates**
[Start closing deals](https://www.kular.ai/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/vO33C21e>)
No lead, no fee
## You only pay when Kular works.
We provide guaranteed results, meaning you only pay when a qualified lead* lands in your inbox or when a sales meeting is booked into your calendar. Not happy with the quality? Let us know why, and you’ll get your money back.‍You have full control of your budget and there's no minimum commitment, so you can cancel any time.
[Get started](https://www.kular.ai/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/vO33C21e>)
$0k
Average deal value
0%
Average close rate
0x
Average **return on investment**
* We define a qualified lead as an individual matching, or tightly aligning with your target criteria, expressing positive interest in engaging in your sales process. This could be a request for a meeting, a question about pricing, etc
A foot in the door
## How does Kular compare?
Cost per qualified lead

Kular

Testimonials
#### For lead generation we use trade shows and Kular. We know that Kular works so we can click a button then generate leads and closed deals. I’m their biggest fan!."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c913407042c830e62250f/66bb28fbce310dce1032a7d8__.png)
David SorensonCEO, Custimoo
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c913407042c830e62250f/66881804b35d8716d1df00a6_TM.png)
![AI Sales Team](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c913407042c830e62250f/667333a7b14b559888d6ec50_Screenshot%202024-05-11%20at%2016.14%204.webp)
Your AI sales team
### Kular makes small teams feel like big teams, and big teams feel invincible
Whether you’re a one-person operation or a growing enterprise, Kular will help you grow revenue. Our AI performs all the tasks of a sales team, identifying prospects, sending emails, and nurturing conversations until leads are ready to close.
[Get your AI sales team](https://www.kular.ai/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/vO33C21e>)
Unprecedented efficiency
### Kular means more sales in less time.
It takes just 15 minutes to get started and we will give you your first lead for free. Kular will automatically email a vast database of potential clients in the blink of an eye. Our AI optimizes its process over time, ensuring that performance remains effective and efficient.Stop wasting time on approaches that go nowhere and get back to running your business.
[Let’s go!](https://www.kular.ai/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/vO33C21e>)
![Kular Sales](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c913407042c830e62250f/671f8813ef6608a500c44a1e_Rectangle%2037.png)
![Kular See Results in Laptop](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c913407042c830e62250f/667333a7d446255d2195db37_Rectangle%2064.webp)
For any experience level
### You don’t need to be an expert to see results with Kular
Whether you’ve been relying on referral marketing or you’ve started testing solutions, you don’t need to be an expert to see results with Kular. Our AI is trained on tens of thousands of human responses, ensuring high-level domain expertise and an unrivalled understanding of how to close sales in your industry.
[Start seeing results](https://www.kular.ai/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/vO33C21e>)

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Kular

**Mission:** Kular aims to replace 20 million salespeople with AI, fundamentally transforming how businesses handle sales processes. The belief here is clear: as human roles in sales evolve, AI can take over and improve efficiency.

**Foundation & Growth:** Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, Kular kicked off its journey with the bold statement, "Hey! We're Kular." Since then, the company has seen a significant growth trajectory, and they're in a phase of expansion, actively hiring to meet increased demand.

**Team & Backing:** The Kular team boasts a solid academic pedigree, featuring graduates from prestigious institutions like MIT, IIT, Cambridge, and Oxford. They’ve also garnered backing from notable investors including Y-Combinator, Entrepreneur First, Acequia Capital, and angel investors behind well-known companies like Ironclad, OpenSea, and Stripe.

**Location:** Kular is headquartered in London, UK, and operates with a dedicated team of 19 employees.

**Target Market:** The company primarily caters to the SaaS and B2B sectors, focusing on optimizing sales outreach for its clients.

### What Kular Offers

Kular’s platform harnesses cutting-edge AI to automate and enhance the lead generation process. Here’s how it works:

1. **Audience Targeting:** Users define their target audience, and Kular’s AI sifts through an extensive database of over 200 million contacts worldwide to identify potential clients.
  
2. **Messaging Optimization:** The platform drafts messages for outreach that you can edit, ensuring that they bypass spam filters and maximize email deliverability—twice the industry standard.

3. **Continuous Learning:** Kular's AI learns from warm email responses, optimizing for conversion rates over time. Users only need to invest about an hour a month to manage their campaigns.

4. **Performance-Based Pricing:** The pricing model is straightforward—you only pay for results. If Kular doesn’t deliver a qualified lead or a booked meeting, you don't pay. This risk-free model ensures that businesses can control their budgets without any minimum commitments.

### Impressive Testimonials & Partnerships

Kular has established trust with over 1,000 firms, including notable brands like Ferrari, P&G, H&M, and IKEA, emphasizing its effectiveness in generating high-quality leads. Many clients have reported substantial returns on investment, such as Abbott Consulting securing a $20k deal during the free trial.

Kular is positioning itself as a revolutionary player in the sales and lead generation arena.
